overview: Marris lives alone in a house left to her by her recently deceased grandmother. She's a disheartened young woman, battling depression and losing her hair. One day a package arrives at her door by mistake. She opens it to reveal a strange marble bowl. When the rightful owner of the bowl knocks at her door, she denies that she ever received the package. But the bowl is more than it seems. And when Marris uses it as a trash can to dispose of her falling hair it leads to an unexpected and bizarre retribution.
title: Newborn
